snippet: Seizing on Mayor Bill de Blasio’s missteps, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was a behind-the-scenes force in giving New York City charter schools some of the most sweeping protections in the nation.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo is a behind-the-scenes force in giving New York City charter schools some of nation's most sweeping protections; interviews with state and city officials as well as education leaders make it clear that far from being a mere cheerleader, Cuomo was a potent force at every turn, seizing on missteps by Mayor Bill de Blasio and driving legislation from start to finish.

byline.original: By JAVIER C. HERNÁNDEZ and SUSANNE CRAIG
byline.contributor: Al Baker, Amy Chozick and Alexandra Stevenson contributed reporting, and Jack Begg contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Seizing on Mayor Bill de Blasio’s missteps, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was a behind-the-scenes force in giving New York City charter schools some of the most sweeping protections in the nation.

headline.main: Cuomo Played Pivotal Role in Charter School Push
headline.print_headline: For Cuomo, Pivotal Role in Charter School Push
